name: BundleMarkdownReaderConfig

omitModulesMenu.description: `modules` will be hidden from markdown reader menu

omitAppsMenu.description: `apps` will be hidden from markdown reader menui

omitDictionaryMenu.description: if true, dictionary is omitted from menu

omitPackagesMenu.description: `packages` will be hidden from markdown reader menu

customOperationNames.description: if given, the operations menu will show with these operations

schema.fullComment: `modules` will be hidden from markdown reader menu
`apps` will be hidden from markdown reader menui
if true, dictionary is omitted from menu
`packages` will be hidden from markdown reader menu
if given, the operations menu will show with these operations
